text: Ara agera dina yara tara abasthara jan'ya kamana karata tara sata-sakale balate lagala -- ''aha dekho! Allah tamre bandadera madhye yake iccha karena tara prati riyeka prasarita karena ebam mepejokhe dena. Allah yadi amadera upare sadaya na hatena tabe amadera'o grasa karatena. Aha dekho! Abisbasira kakhano saphalakama haya na.â€™â€™
